Source.Name: quickemu
Source.Summary: Quickly create and run optimised Windows, macOS and Linux virtual machines
Source.Description: Quickemu is a wrapper for the excellent QEMU that automatically "does the right thing" when creating virtual machines. No requirement for exhaustive configuration options. You decide what operating system you want to run and Quickemu takes care of the rest.

Package.Name: quickemu
Package.Summary: Quickly create and run optimised Windows, macOS and Linux virtual machines
Package.Description: Quickemu is a wrapper for the excellent QEMU that automatically "does the right thing" when creating virtual machines. No requirement for exhaustive configuration options. You decide what operating system you want to run and Quickemu takes care of the rest.
